    Some quotes to get back again to blogging

    I took a break from blogging to work on the self, myself and I. Tim Ferris podcast & the unmistakable creative have been a great source of inspiration, highly recommend to everyone.

    The following quotes, caught my attention.

    Hope is not a strategy, luck is not a factor, failure is not an option - James Cameron.

    Do you want to change your life faster trade your expectation for appreciation, you will have a whole new life - Tony Robbins.

    What you know doesnâ€™t mean shit - Tony Robbins.

    Listen to Tony Robbins on Morning Routines, Peak Performance, and Mastering Money interview with Tim Ferriss.
